Newark.Seton Hall University School of Medicine:
The Seton Hall University School of Medicine is a post-secondary degree-granting institution concentrating in medical training within Seton Hall University. It was established in 2015 as a joint venture between Seton Hall and Hackensack University Health Network (Hackensack UNH).
